coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for members for outpatient & in-patient services except outpatient services with limits & dental, kidney dialysis, optical, and hearing aids. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: VIP E/W/C/Senior deductible: 10% up to SAR 100 for (IMC - Jeddah & Suliman Habib Group all branches). Parent VIP scheme deductible: 10% up to 100 SR for all providers (IMC-Jeddah & Suliman Habib Group all branches & Salama Hospital - Jeddah), deductible 20% up to 300 SR. Optical coverage applies to all members. Frame limit up to optical limit. Dental crowns covered. Vitamins covered if prescribed as part of treatment. Allergy treatment covered. Dental and optical claims outside APN reimbursed in full. Newborns born outside KSA as part of a pre-approved maternity case have automatic cover from date of birth if spouse has valid Iqama. Epidural injection covered during delivery if medically required.

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services, except for outpatient services that have limits and special cases (dental, kidney dialysis, optical, and hearing aids). Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
